newsitem.title: USA: TABLE - Rankin Automotive Q1 shr $0.03.
newsitem.headline: TABLE - Rankin Automotive Q1 shr $0.03.

text.p: ($000's omitted except in per share earnings)

NOTE: The company said earnings were slightly lower because of an increased level of expenses resulting from a 15-store growth. The company said it is "aggressively" working to reduce the payroll costs which contributed to the overall cost increase.
